cast.original_title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
cast.overview: An award-winning cynical journalist, Lloyd Vogel, begrudgingly accepts an assignment to write an Esquire profile piece on the beloved television icon Fred Rogers. After his encounter with Rogers, Vogel's perspective on life is transformed.
cast.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood

details.biography: Gavin Borders is an actor, known for A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood (2019), WandaVision (2021) and Marvel Studios: Assembled (2021).
details.name: Gavin Borders
